description: This file serves as the entry point for a React-based frontend application. It imports React and ReactDOM, along with CSS styling and the main App component, and renders the App component within the DOM element with id 'root'.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a new root for rendering a React component tree.

methods.name: root.render
methods.description: Renders React components into the specified DOM node.
